ResourceHeader.ResourceName: OMTI Fabry-Perot interferometer wind data (558-nm airglow) at Shigaraki, Japan
ResourceHeader.Description: Optical Mesosphere Thermosphere Imagers (OMTIs) Fabry-Perot Interferometer (FPI) Data. The FPI measures neutral wind in the mesopause region at 90-100km altitudes through the Doppler shift of 558-nm airglow emission. For more information, see http://stdb2.isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp/omti/. Digital data are available upon request to PI. For details of the instrument, please take a look at Shiokawa, K., T. Kadota, Y. Otsuka, T. Ogawa, T. Nakamura, and S. Fukao, A two-channel Fabry-Perot interferometer with thermoelectric-cooled CCD detectors for neutral wind measurement in the upper atmosphere, Earth Planets Space, 55, 271-275, 2003.
